title: Should I buy a POCO C3 if I am a student? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think smartphones like Poco C3 are primarily meant for the students who are attending online classes while the schools and colleges are closed due to Covid-19 effect. And this is actually quite a wonderful smartphone that supports the latest features and is not even too heavy on the pockets. Starting at just 7.5k in India, Poco C3 has MediaTek Helio G35 processor that makes it great to work without lags and hiccups. Besides, with a 5MP front camera, you can attend your online classes without any hassles. Even the powerful 13MP triple rear camera is something that most of the people would love to have. Not just this, you would also love its huge 5000mAh battery that comes with 10W fast charging support and this is also a good feature for the students to last long during the calls. The other features such as display and storage are also good.

Yes, a student can buy the Poco C3 because not only does it have reliable and efficient features, but it also comes with an extremely affordable price point. The price of the base variant with 3GB RAM and 32GB internal storage is around 7.499 INR. In terms of features, it has a 6.43 - inch IPS LCD capacitative touchscreen with a resolution of 720*1600 pixels. It is powered by the Mediatek Helio G35 processor. Poco C3 has a triple camera led by a 13MP main lens with f/2.2 aperture, a 2MP macro sensor with f/2.4 lens, and a 2MP depth sensor with f/2.4 lens. It also comes with a 5MPcamera at the front for selfies. The battery power is a massive 5000mAh and it has an Android 10 operating system. Based on the combination of the features and price, Poco C3 seems like a neat and apt choice for students.
